bibl.title: Maloievestn'ij pamjatnik koptskoj metalloplastiki ne sobranija Ermitaz. Avec résumé en anglais: A Little Known Object of Coptic Metal Plastics from the Hermitage Collection.
bibl.note: St. Petersburg, Hermitage Museum, Inv. 13211. Wooden panel with 3 brass plates, 21,8 x 6,9 x 1,0 cm. The characters depicted on the plates are Orpheus and Dionysos accompanied by Satyrs and Maenads. Alexandria (?), 3rd/4th cent. A.D.
KAKOVKIN A.Ja., Maloievestn'ij pamjatnik koptskoj metalloplastiki ne sobranija Ermitaz. Avec résumé en anglais: A Little Known Object of Coptic Metal Plastics from the Hermitage Collection.
